001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.core;
002
003import jakarta.inject.Inject;
004import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
005import org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.LoggerContext;
006import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory;
007import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Injectee;
008import org.glassfish.hk2.api.InstantiationService;
009import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PerLookup;
010import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
011
012import java.io.IOException;
013
014@Service
015public class LoggerFactory
016        implements Factory<Logger> {
017
018    private final InstantiationService instantiationService;
019    private final LoggerContext loggerContext;
020
021    @Inject
022    public LoggerFactory(InstantiationService instantiationService, LoggerContext loggerContext) throws IOException {
023        this.instantiationService = instantiationService;
024        this.loggerContext = loggerContext;
025    }
026
027    @Override
028    @PerLookup
029    public Logger provide() {
030
031        Injectee injectee = instantiationService.getInstantiationData().getParentInjectee();
032        if (injectee != null)
033            if (injectee.getInjecteeDescriptor() != null) {
034                String name = injectee.getInjecteeDescriptor().getImplementation();
035                return loggerContext.getLogger(name);
036            } else if (injectee.getInjecteeClass() != null) {
037                return loggerContext.getLogger(injectee.getInjecteeClass());
038            }
039
040        return loggerContext.getLogger("xorcery");
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public void dispose(Logger instance) {
045    }
046}
